snippet.title: Arcade Rampart (1989), complete game (5cc) on Easy
snippet.description:
I think this is the first complete playthrough of arcade Rampart, from Atari Games, on Youtube.

Even though this game uses four continues and is on Easy settings, arcade Rampart, at least with the trackball version which makes piece placement harder, is difficult. Final score was slightly more than 50,000. (I've never had a game of arcade Rampart with a score of over 60,000.)

There's some mistakes in this playthrough, it's hard to avoid making any. For more about Rampart, see upcoming issues of my fanzine, EXTENDED PLAY, at https://sites.google.com/view/extendedplay/, which will examine this brilliant and deceptively deep game in detail!

This was recorded using OBS, reencoded in Handbrake, and originally played using the trackball version (via mouse) on MAME v.123 (the last version of MAME that Rampart plays properly on, due to an obscure bug in later versions. The bug has been reported here: https://mametesters.org/view.php?id=7119).
